Package game

Class Obstacle

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.GameObject
      • game.CameraObservedObject
        • game.Terrain
          • game.Obstacle
  • public class Obstacle
extends Terrain
    A class of Terrain that represents obstacles which will damage a Character when touched.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int dmg
      The amount of damage a Character is to receive upon touching the Obstacle.
